_comment: ISB Billing Separator - CDK Context Configuration
_instructions: Copy this file to cdk.context.json and fill in your values. Never commit cdk.context.json with real values.
_security_note: Ensure Hub and Org Management accounts have the required ISB IAM roles configured before deployment.
_environment_desc: Environment name (dev/staging/prod). Used in stack names and resource naming.
_hubAccountId_desc: AWS Account ID where the Hub stack deploys. This is your ISB Hub account ID. Replace with your actual Hub account ID.
_orgMgmtAccountId_desc: AWS Account ID of the Organization Management account where CloudTrail events originate. Replace with your actual Org Management account ID.
_accountTableName_desc: Name of the ISB DynamoDB table storing sandbox account records. Typically 'isb-sandbox-accounts' unless customized.
_sandboxOuId_desc: ID of the parent Innovation Sandbox OU containing all ISB OUs. Find via AWS Organizations console.
_availableOuId_desc: ID of the Available OU - accounts moving here from CleanUp trigger quarantine. REQUIRED for OrgMgmtStack deployment.
_quarantineOuId_desc: ID of the Quarantine OU - accounts are held here for 72 hours for billing attribution.
_cleanupOuId_desc: ID of the CleanUp OU - only accounts coming FROM this OU are quarantined (source filter).
_intermediateRoleArn_desc: ARN of the ISB intermediate role in Hub account for role chaining to Org Management account. Replace account ID.
_orgMgtRoleArn_desc: ARN of the ISB role in Org Management account with Organizations API access. Replace account ID.
_snsAlertEmail_desc: Email address to receive CloudWatch alarm notifications for quarantine issues.
